div.p: Moritur „III. kal. Sept.“, Emort. mon. Casin. ap. Muratori R. It. SS. V. 75, Necrol. Casin. ap. eund. VII. 944, Hist. Farf. in MG. SS. XI. 590, Chronica de Mailros 1181 ap. Fell R. A. SS. p. 175, ed. Stevenson p. 91; cf. Alexandri epitaphium in Archivio della soc. Romana di stor. patr. II. 361, et in Magno chron. Belg. ap. Pistorium et Struvium R. G. SS. III. 207, et ap. Watterich II. 649. Chron. Gaufr. prioris Vosiensis ap. Labbe Bibl. II. 327, in MG. SS. XXVI. 203: „Hebdomada eiusdem mensis (Augusti) ultima Alexander urbe Castellana decedens“. (Annal. Ratispon. 1181 in MG. SS. XVII. 589: „kal. Sept.“; Annal. Ceccanenses 1181 ibid. XIX. 287: „Tertio die intrante mense Septembri Alexander papa obiit“; Gesta Henrici II., olim Benedicto Petroburg. tributa, 1181 ed. Stubbs I. 282: „migravit in ipsa b. Matthaei apostoli vigilis, mense Septembris, duodeeimo kalendas Ocrobris„)
